info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 6:17PM PDT until August 01 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 616 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Rock Canyon Campground, or near Summerlin, and is moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, North Las Vegas, Lone Mountain, Summerlin, The Strip, Spring Valley, Blue Diamond, Centennial Hills, Red Rock Canyon, Paradise, Enterprise, Rocky Gap Campground, Red Rock Canyon Campground, North Las Vegas Airport, Spring Mountain Ranch, Mccarran International Airport, Stratosphere Tower and The Lakes. This includes the following roads... State Route 159 in Red Rock Canyon between mile markers 1 and 14. State Route 160 in Clark County between mile markers 9 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
